text:
I am a webmaster who has usually done binary installs or had sys admins do the 
builds. I am about to do another full install and was reminded of this source 
of confusion: in /manual/install.html you state 'Select modules to compile into 
Apache in the Configuration file. ' What you mean, I believe, is 'Select 
modules to compile into Apache in the Configuration file 
(prefix/src/Configuration.tpl). '. This avoids the confusion many of us (I) 
experienced who thought you mean httpd.conf configuration files....

Hope that helps...

Jonathan Driller
creator: jdriller@orchid.org

text:
This is fixed in CVS now and will be in the next release. Thanks for the hint
and for using Apache!

Cheers,
